Reviews.Title: Horrible do not buy
Reviews.Author: Odin
Reviews.Content: I would give it no stars if I could. It does not work. And is not in fact unlocked. After research I found that it can not be unlocked.

Reviews.Title: Hot Spot
Reviews.Author: Tony Parks
Reviews.Content: Was a good buy , was able to use any provider plan I wanted. Have to find a plan that covers where you need.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Marko Kokelj
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect, the item is as described, unfortunately I can't use it in EU, but it is my mistake.
